Pedro Edson Fardim

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/6004796853746773
  • Última atualização do currículo em 21/06/2012

Full Professor (Biomass Chemical Engineering), Professor i kemisk träförädlingsteknik Habilitation (Chemical Engineering), Post-Doc in Fibre and Papermaking Chemistry, D.Sc. in Chemistry (Physical Chemistry). I have 8 years of R&D experience in a top-level forest-based company working in projects involving from wood to paper including biomass chemistry, packaging, recycling and printing. Specialties: Chemistry and topochemistry of biomass components, fibre and cellulose; Molecular and supramolecular interactions in natural materials; Biomimetics and nanomaterials; New materials; Spectroscopy and spectrometry (Texto informado pelo autor)
